evidence.claim: The company outlines their commitment to HIPAA compliance on their security pages, emphasizing the protection of sensitive patient information.
Statements regarding the use of standardized health data formats like FHIR and HL7 were found, indicating adherence to interoperable health information models.
Job postings mention skills in cloud service management, including AWS, showing reliance on cloud infrastructure for data management.
References to EDI compliance suggest integration capabilities to handle health transactions, indicating use of X12 transaction sets.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence of X12 transactions or API use cases found.
